DOC.brief_title: Tailored Web Peer Email Cessation Counseling College Smokers
DOC.detailed_description: The RealU address smoke young adult population occasional daily smoker . Aim 1 . To determine efficacy provide individually tailor smoking cessation message part general interest website young adult . Aim 2 . To determine efficacy provide individually tailor smoking cessation message plus peer email , phone online support part general interest website young adult . Participants recruit via direct email send undergraduate graduate student University MI well direct email send participant Survey Sampling International National Data Group . Individuals invite complete online survey health hope young adult . Participants eligible full intervention invite join RealU Study . Participants ask complete online enrollment survey consent form . Eligible , enrol participant randomly assign one follow three study arm : - untailored general interest/lifestyle website - individually tailor web intervention health lifestyle - individually tailor web intervention health lifestyle coaching peer , include video , phone , email Assessments conduct 7 week 12 week post-enrollment . The primary outcome measure self-reported 30-day abstinence 12 week .
DOC.criteria: Age 1835 Able read English Internet access next 3 month Selfreported internet use per week Smoked least one puff cigarette past 30 day Use smokeless tobacco past 30 day
